T5EK.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
T5EK.SheetEdit.Description: Toggle visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
T5EK.SheetLock.Description: Toggle lock for sensitive fields that should not change often
T5EK.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
T5EK.GmOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
T5EK.AttunementWarning: Attunement: Unable to attune to more than {number} items.
T5EK.SearchHint: Start typing to show search results
T5EK.ItemCardsKeyHint: hold key to interact with card
T5EK.PreparedSpellsMax: Maximum for prepared spells (Note: do not use 'Override' mode on the active effect')

T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.name: Tidy Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.hint: Customize your own version of Tidy 5e Sheets
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.label: Sheet Settings
T5EK.Settings.SheetMenu.title: T5EK Sheet Settings

T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint: Prevent players from making changes to aspects of their character sheets that should change infrequently. Optionally hide some elements that you don't want to use at all.
T5EK.Settings.TabLocks.hint2: Important: sheet lock features are intended to guide player sheet use and to help prevent mistakes such as accidentally adding/removing saving throw proficiency. Sheet lock settings do not provide a secure lockdown against players with malicious intent.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.name: Show item cards in all layouts
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.hint: When this setting is disabled, item cards only show in the grid.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.name: Show item cards for NPCs/vehicles
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.hint: Enable to show item info cards for NPCs and vehicles.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.name: Show floating item cards
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.hint: Enable to have item info cards float next to the mouse cursor. Recommended: use delay with this feature.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.name: Item card delay (ms)
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.hint: Delays showing item cards for the specified milliseconds (ms). 0 means no delay. Default: 300.

T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.name: Item card fix key
T5EK.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.hint: Hold this keyboard character (e.g., x) while viewing an item card to keep it visible and allow for interaction.

T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.name: Default color theme
T5EK.Settings.DefaultTheme.hint: The default theme for all users who do not have a specific theme selected.

T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.name: Use classic list controls
T5EK.Settings.UseClassicControls.hint: Shows controls in the list view.

T5EK.Settings.HideIconsNextToTheItemName.name: Hide item name icons
T5EK.Settings.HideIconsNextToTheItemName.hint: Hides the support icons next to the object name (Favorite, Attunement, etc.). This is useful in preventing redundant icons when classic controls are visible.

T5EK.Settings.TraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels
T5EK.Settings.TraitLabels.hint: Shows labels for PC, NPC, and Vehicle traits. Disable to show only icons.

T5EK.Settings.PlayerName.name: Show player name
T5EK.Settings.PlayerName.hint: Shows a field for the player name below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.ClassList.name: Hide class list
T5EK.Settings.ClassList.hint: Hides the class list below the character's name.

T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide exhaustion and inspiration tracker on 0
T5EK.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Hides exhaustion and inspiration if 0 but still shows on hover.

T5EK.Settings.InspirationOnHover.name: Show inspiration indicator only on hover
T5EK.Settings.InspirationOnHover.hint: Shows the inspiration indicator only when hovering over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.name: Show exhaustion tracker only on hover
T5EK.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.hint: Shows the exhaustion tracker only when hovering over the portrait.

T5EK.Settings.HpBar.name: Use health bar
T5EK.Settings.HpBar.hint: Shows a colored bar indicating the remaining HP. Health numbers will still be visible.

T5EK.Settings.HpOverlay.name: Use health overlay
T5EK.Settings.HpOverlay.hint: Shows a colored HP overlay for this actor type.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.name: Toggle empty character traits
T5EK.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.hint: Adds a toggle button for hiding empty traits.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResource.name: Move traits below resources
T5EK.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResource.hint: Moves traits from the side to below resources.

T5EK.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.name: Show only equipped ammunition
T5EK.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.hint: Shows only currently equipped ammunition in the weapon ammo selector.

T5EK.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.name: Always show traits
T5EK.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.hint: Removes the visibility toggle button for empty traits and shows all.

T5EK.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.name: Always show skills
T5EK.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.hint: Removes the visibility toggle button for non-proficient skills and shows all.

T5EK.Settings.ShowSpellbookTabNpc.name: Show spellbook tab
T5EK.Settings.ShowSpellbookTabNpc.hint: Shows a spellbook tab for NPCs. Disable to move the spellbook section to the Attributes tab.

T5EK.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.name: Show Active Effects Marker
T5EK.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.hint: Shows a marker for list view items that have active effects.

T5EK.Settings.UseContextMenu.name: Use context menu
T5EK.Settings.UseContextMenu.hint: Enables right-click context menu on items.

T5EK.Settings.ExpandedSheet.name: Show expanded limited view
T5EK.Settings.ExpandedSheet.hint: Displays the entire sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

T5EK.Settings.EditTotalLock.name: Lock down sensitive fields
T5EK.Settings.EditTotalLock.hint: Locks infrequently changed fields (name, proficiency toggles) and hides configuration buttons when the sheet is locked.

T5EK.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.name: Limit active effects management to GMs
T5EK.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.hint: Limits permission to edit or toggle active effects to GMs only.

T5EK.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.name: Always show item quantity
T5EK.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.hint: Shows item quantity on list views even when not hovered.

T5EK.Settings.UseInspiration.name: Use inspiration tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseInspiration.hint: Shows an inspiration tracker on the character profile.

T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.name: Use vehicle motion tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleMotion.hint: Shows a motion tracker on the vehicle profile.

T5EK.Settings.UseExhaustion.name: Use exhaustion tracker
T5EK.Settings.UseExhaustion.hint: Shows an exhaustion tracker for characters, NPCs, and vehicles.

T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcs.name: Use NPC rest
T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcs.hint: Allows NPCs to take short and long rests.

T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.name: Hide chat card for NPC rest
T5EK.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.hint: Prevents the Chat Card for NPC rest from showing.

T5EK.Settings.LinkMarker.name: Mark linked/unlinked NPCs
T5EK.Settings.LinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unliked NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTab.name: Default sheet tab
T5EK.Settings.DefaultSheetTab.hint: Shows the indicated tab when opening a sheet for the first time.

T5EK.Settings.HiddenDeathSaves.name: Hide death saves from players
T5EK.Settings.HiddenDeathSaves.hint: Makes death saves and death save results visible only to the GM.

T5EK.Settings.UseSpellSlotMarker.name: Use spell slot marker
T5EK.Settings.UseSpellSlotMarker.hint: Shows spell slot markers (dots) above leveled spell sections in the spellbook.

T5EK.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceBar.name: Use Character encumbrance bar
T5EK.Settings.UseCharacterEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on character sheets.

T5EK.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.name: Use NPC encumbrance bar
T5EK.Settings.UseNPCEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on NPC sheets.

T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.name: Use vehicle encumnrance bar
T5EK.Settings.UseVehicleEncumbranceBar.hint: Shows an encumbrance bar on vehicle sheets.

T5EK.Settings.npcSheetWidth.name: Default NPC sheet width
T5EK.Settings.npcSheetWidth.hint: The width of the NPC sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.playerSheetWidth.name: Default player sheet width
T5EK.Settings.playerSheetWidth.hint: The width of the player character sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.vehicleSheetWidth.name: Default vehicle sheet width
T5EK.Settings.vehicleSheetWidth.hint: The width of the vehicle sheet in pixels when showing the sheet for the first time. Requires a refresh to take effect. Default: 740.

T5EK.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFilt.name: Use multiclass spellbook filter
T5EK.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFilt.hint: Allows filtering spells by class in the spellbook tab. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet.

T5EK.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.name: Use spell class icon for spells
T5EK.Settings.UseSpellClassIcons.hint: Shows spell class's image on spells instead of the spell's own image. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet. When multiclassing, this feature dinstinguishes which spells belong to which class at a glance.

T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.name: Additional classes for multiclass spellbook filtering
T5EK.Settings.SpellClassFilterAdditional.hint: Puts additional classes in the multiclass spellbook filter. Add classes to the dropdown with this syntax "id1|name1,id2|name2" e.g. "occultist|Occultist,alchemist|Alchemist"

T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.name: Allow cantrips to be prepared
T5EK.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepared.hint: The "cantrip formulas" optional rule from Tashas Cauldron of Everything allows wizards to prepare cantrips after a long rest in the same way that they do with leveled spells. Prepared cantrips do not count toward to total prepared spells.

T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.name: Lock currency
T5EK.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to currency.

T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.name: Lock experience
T5EK.Settings.LockExpChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to experience.

T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.name: Lock max HP changes
T5EK.Settings.LockHpMaxChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to max HP.

T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.name: Lock level selector
T5EK.Settings.LockLevelSelector.hint: Prevents non-GMs from changing player levels with the class level selector.

T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.name: Lock sheet selection
T5EK.Settings.LockConfigureSheet.hint: Prevents non-GMs from selecting another sheet layout.

T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.name: Lock item quantity
T5EK.Settings.LockItemQuantity.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to item quantity.

T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.name: Allow HP max override on character
T5EK.Settings.AllowHpMaxOverride.hint: Allows the GM to manually change max HP on the character sheet.

T5EK.Settings.Reset.name: Reset settings to default
T5EK.Settings.Reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default. This affects "world"-scoped settings only, such as GM options.

dialogs.title: Reset Module Settings
dialogs.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? This cannot be undone.

T5EK.Settings.Debug.name: Enable debugging
T5EK.Settings.Debug.hint: Prints debug messages to the console.

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.name: Character Sheet: always unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.hint: Treat the character sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the character, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the character.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnCha.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.name: NPC Sheet: always unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.hint: Treat the NPC sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the NPC, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the NPC.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnNPC.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.name: Vehicle Sheet: always unlocked for GM
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.hint: Treat the vehicle sheet as though it were always unlocked, regardless of the lock setting. The GM can always edit the vehicle, but they can also toggle lock/unlock for a player who also owns the vehicle.
T5EK.Settings.EnablePermanentUnlockOnVeh.title: This sheet is always unlocked for the GM, regardless of the lock setting.

SheetMenu.name: Tidy Theme Settings
SheetMenu.hint: Customize the colors of Tidy 5e Sheets.

Sheet.title: Theme Settings
Sheet.importDropHint: Hint: You can drag a ".tidy5e-theme" file onto this form to import it.
Sheet.importError: Theme import failed. See console for more details.
Sheet.explanation: Select what color you wish to use for each option. The value "#00000000" is equivalent to disabling the color.

T5EK.VehicleExhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
T5EK.VehicleExhaustion6: Hit points drop to 0 and the vehicle breaks down
